msg.msgText: A method call to set, add, or remove ImaProperties values failed because the properties are read only.

msgExplanation.p: When ImaProperties are in read-only state, calls to addValidProperty(), clear(), put(), putAll(), or remove() are allowed only for properties with names that contain the string 'user'.

msgUserResponse.p: Ensure that ImaProperties are writable before attempting to set, add, or remove properties. After ImaProperties are in read-only state, ensure that only properties with names that contain 'user' are set, added, or removed.
